test_complaints.title: Big pothole on Palm Beach Road near Vashi Railway Station
test_complaints.description: There is a large pothole on Palm Beach Road near Vashi Railway Station causing traffic problems. The road is damaged and needs immediate repair. Many vehicles are getting damaged.
test_complaints.address: Palm Beach Road, Vashi, Navi Mumbai, 400703

test_complaints.title: Water pipeline burst on Belapur Station Road
test_complaints.description: Water pipe has burst near Belapur Station Road. Water is leaking continuously and flooding the street. Urgent repair needed.
test_complaints.address: Station Road, CBD Belapur, Navi Mumbai, 400614

test_complaints.title: Garbage not collected for 5 days in Kharghar
test_complaints.description: Garbage has not been collected from our area in Kharghar for the past 5 days. The dustbin is overflowing and creating hygiene issues. Please send garbage collection vehicle.

test_complaints.title: Streetlight not working in Nerul Sector 48
test_complaints.description: The streetlight near Nerul Sector 48 is not working for the past week. The area becomes very dark at night creating safety issues.

test_complaints.title: Drainage blockage causing waterlogging
test_complaints.description: The drainage system is blocked near Albert Ekka Chowk. Rainwater is not flowing and causing severe waterlogging. The entire street is flooded.

test_complaints.title: Broken bench in Oxygen Park
test_complaints.description: The bench in Oxygen Park is broken and needs repair. It's a safety hazard for visitors.

test_complaints.title: Power outage in Doranda area
test_complaints.description: There is no electricity in Doranda area since morning. The transformer seems to be faulty. Please restore power supply urgently.

test_complaints.title: Road cracks near Morabadi Ground
test_complaints.description: Multiple cracks have appeared on the road near Morabadi Ground. The road surface is deteriorating and needs resurfacing.

test_complaints.title: No water supply in Kanke area
test_complaints.description: There has been no water supply in Kanke area for the past 2 days. The water tank is empty. Please restore water supply.

test_complaints.title: Dirty area near market
test_complaints.description: The area near Lalpur market is very dirty. Garbage is scattered everywhere. Cleaning and sanitation required urgently.

test_complaints.title: Multiple streetlights not working on HEC Road
test_complaints.description: Around 10-12 streetlights are not working on HEC Road. The entire stretch is dark at night. Bulbs need replacement.

test_complaints.title: Sewage overflow in residential area
test_complaints.description: Sewage is overflowing from the manhole in our residential area. The drain is completely blocked. Very unhygienic situation.

test_complaints.title: Tree cutting required near school
test_complaints.description: A large tree near DAV School is overgrown and branches are hanging dangerously. Tree trimming or cutting required for safety.

test_complaints.title: Broken footpath near bus stand
test_complaints.description: The footpath near Navi Mumbaibus stand is completely broken. People are having difficulty walking. Repair needed urgently.

test_complaints.title: Water leakage from underground pipe
test_complaints.description: There is continuous water leakage from an underground pipeline near Harmu Housing Colony. Water is being wasted.

test_complaints.title: Waste pile near residential area
test_complaints.description: A large pile of waste has been dumped near our residential area. It's creating foul smell and attracting flies. Immediate disposal required.

test_complaints.title: Dim streetlight near college
test_complaints.description: The streetlight near Navi MumbaiCollege is very dim. The bulb needs replacement for proper illumination.

test_complaints.title: Stagnant water causing mosquito breeding
test_complaints.description: Rainwater has collected in the drainage near our area. The water is stagnant for many days and mosquitoes are breeding. Health hazard.

test_complaints.title: Garden maintenance needed in Tagore Hill
test_complaints.description: The garden in Tagore Hill area needs maintenance. Plants are overgrown and the area looks neglected. Beautification required.

test_complaints.title: Electric wire hanging dangerously
test_complaints.description: An electric wire is hanging low near Ratu Road. It's very dangerous and can cause accidents. Immediate attention required.

test_complaints.title: Road construction incomplete
test_complaints.description: Road construction work near Bariatu was started but left incomplete. The road is in very bad condition with construction debris.

test_complaints.title: Low water pressure in taps
test_complaints.description: We are getting very low water pressure in our area. Water is barely coming from taps. Please check the water supply system.

test_complaints.title: Public toilet not cleaned
test_complaints.description: The public toilet near market area has not been cleaned for many days. It's very dirty and unhygienic. Regular cleaning needed.

test_complaints.title: Street light pole damaged
test_complaints.description: A streetlight pole near Hinoo has been damaged in an accident. The pole is bent and the light is not working.

test_complaints.title: Manhole cover missing
test_complaints.description: The manhole cover is missing near Ashok Nagar. It's very dangerous, especially at night. Someone can fall into it.

test_complaints.title: Park fence broken
test_complaints.description: The fence around the park in Lalpur area is broken at multiple places. Animals are entering and damaging plants.

test_complaints.title: Power fluctuation damaging appliances
test_complaints.description: There is frequent power fluctuation in our area. Voltage is not stable and household appliances are getting damaged.

test_complaints.title: Bridge railing damaged
test_complaints.description: The railing of the bridge near Hatia is damaged. It's a safety concern for pedestrians and vehicles.

test_complaints.title: Water contamination reported
test_complaints.description: The water supply in our area seems contaminated. The water has a bad smell and color. Please check water quality urgently.

test_complaints.title: Illegal dumping of waste
test_complaints.description: Someone is illegally dumping construction waste near our area. The waste pile is growing and blocking the road.

test_complaints.title: General complaint about civic services
test_complaints.description: I want to complain about the overall civic services in our area. Multiple issues need attention.
test_complaints.note: Ambiguous - should go to manual review

test_complaints.title: Road and drainage both issues
test_complaints.description: There is a pothole on the road and also the nearby drain is blocked. Both need fixing.

test_complaints.title: Urgent: Major accident risk on highway
test_complaints.description: There is a huge pothole on NH-33 highway near Navi Mumbai. Multiple accidents have already occurred. This is a life-threatening situation requiring immediate action.

test_complaints.title: Playground equipment broken
test_complaints.description: The swings and slides in the children's playground at Kanke are broken and rusty. Safety hazard for children.

test_complaints.title: Short circuit in street light
test_complaints.description: There seems to be a short circuit in the streetlight near Kokar. Sparks are visible. Very dangerous situation.
